column2: then I got their dry aged bone-in ribeye.  I've been to steak places all over Chicago
column3: and I have to say this was without a doubt the worst steak I've ever had since going to Sizzler in my college days.  Fatty
column5: without any of the typical flavor that you would get from dry aging
column6: just awful.  Their wine list also was very disappointing as the wines either were not good
column7: or had such a large mark-up that is bounded on the ridiculous.  We also had the corn side
